name: Andrew Lincoln
summary:
Andrew Lincoln. Actor: The Walking Dead. Andrew Lincoln is a British actor. Lincoln spent his early childhood in Hull, Yorkshire before his family relocated to Bath, Somerset when he was age 10. He was educated at Beechen Cliff School in Bath, and then the prestigious Royal Academy of Dramatic Art in London. His father is a civil engineer and his mother is a nurse

Lincoln's first big break came when he...
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award | 6 wins & 22 nominations total
